name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Moisturizer & Primer with Vitamin C + Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: A bestselling hydrating primer and moisturizer that nourishes, plumps, and preps skin to improve the look of foundation...Highlighted Ingredients: - Vitamins B, C, and E: Help replenish and condition skin with essential nourishment.- Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter: Help quickly hydrate, visibly plump, and prep skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow.- Grapefruit and Geranium: Leave a light, uplifting scent on skin..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This hydrating formula blends the performance of a makeup primer with the cushion of a moisturizer. The rich yet lightweight and fast-absorbing texture layers seamlessly with makeup and other skincare products and grips foundation for smooth, seamless application...Clinical Results: From consumer testing on 123 women after using product for 1 week:- 98% said it left skin looking rejuvenated- 96% said it left skin feeling nourished and conditioned- 96% said it left skin feeling moisturized throughout the day- 96% said it left skin looking healthy.- 95% said it left skin feeling healthy and infused with moisture.- 95% said it gripped makeup for flawless application.- 95% said it layers well with makeup, helping makeup apply smoothly and evenly.- 93% said if left skin feeling plumped.- 91% said it improved the look of foundation..
ingredients: -Vitamins B, C, and E: Help replenish and condition skin with essential nourishment..-Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter: Help quickly hydrate, visibly plump, and prep skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow. .-Grapefruit and Geranium: Leave a light, uplifting scent on skin. ..WaterAquaEau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butylene Glycol, Ppg-2 Myristyl Ether Propionate, Cetyl Alcohol, Peg-40 Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Squalane, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Epilobium Angustifolium Extract, Yeast ExtractFaexExtrait De Levure, Beta-Carotene, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Tetrasodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Panthenol, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Massage moisturizer primer base onto just-cleansed skin as part of your daily skin-care regimen, avoiding the eye area. .- Use the primer with an eye base (sold separately) to help achieve moisturizing prep for underneath your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was just browsing around the store, and sampled this product- it was a must have!! I’ve added it to my skin care routine, applying day and night, as well as a primer for makeup. So glad I purchased!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this. I have never used primers since I do a good job being consistent with skincare, but this definitely added more glow, bouncy and youthful appearance to my face for makeup. My makeup layers really well with this. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this and have used it about four times all with different foundations/tinted moisturizers and it truly is an amazing face base and perfectly hydrates your face for your make up. However, I hate that this is not fragrance free. First off, the smell is not good. Second, so many people have issues with fragrance in moisturizers and make up products in terms of allergic reactions so why are we still using them? I personally have not had any reaction. But it works so well to the point where I can ignore the smell. Hopefully one day they will make a fragrance free option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible smell. Sadly, few and far between, incentivized individuals give honest feedback on these reviews. Please don't believe the raving reviews on here. When people don't pay for items with their hard earned money, they tend to love the product and the monetary incentives tied to selling them. We need to stop buying what influencers recommend, and start listening to the people with no followers spending time and money on products they believe in and giving us HONEST reviews about items in their content. They are easy to spot and they have no affiliated links! Influencers all start pushing the same lines at the same time because incentives for those items at the time can't be beat.

reviews.review_text: This can be a finicky primer but with the right complexion products it's pretty amazing. Admittedly, I hated this for a while because it always made my complexion look worse(pilling, separating, etc.) plus the fragrance is pretty strong. However, I recently found my holy grail foundation (Chanel Les Beige Complexion) and this makes it look even better! My makeup will stay looking fresh through an entire work day with a dewy, but not overly shiny, finish. I have really dry skin so I couldn't ask for better.   I would definitely recommend starting with the trial size. I tried the primer with a lot of products (including ones Beauty YouTubers recommend it with) before I found my match. Plus the scent can be very off putting... I honestly am trying to find a similar primer without fragrance, but will continue buying until then.

I prefer it as a primer over a facial lotionn but it works well for that too. I live at high altitude and in a very dry environment so this was a nice lift for my face back to a light moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry combo skin but right now in this winter weather, my skin has been extra dry and flaky. This moisturizer has been my new favorite! The consistency is on the thicker side but it absorbs into the skin so well. It leaves your skin hydrated and smooth and not heavy or any stickiness.  I have been using it daily even on no makeup days. It does work very well under makeup and actually helps blend my foundation seamlessly without any separation. If you’re looking into a new moisturizer this one is definitely a perfect one for combo to dry skin because of how hydrating it leaves your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best primer I’ve ever tried! It feels light and hydrating without being too much and my skin feels smooth for my makeup. I love the ingredients including vitamins B, C, and E as well as hyaluronic acid and Shea butter.  It helps my makeup last longer and is so nourishing for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base Primer Moisturizer is probably one of the best things I’ve ever put on my face. The cream absorbs so easily into my skin and gave my dry Winter texture a smooth, hydrated feel. I cannot say enough about the way my face looked and felt, and I’m a huge fan of beauty products that multi-task. This can be used as a primer under makeup, or just as a moisturizer to create a barrier against impurities. It has vitamins for nourishment, Shea Butter, and Hyaluronic Acid. My only issue with this product is that I felt the scent was a bit much while applying. It almost has a hint of citronella to me, but the scent didn’t seem to last too long once it was on. I am very sensitive to smells, and the fact that this cream provided amazing results with my face, I will continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently recieved the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base and I have to say, it has become a permanent staple in my daily skincare routine. Not only is it a fantastic face moisturizer, but it doubles as a foundation primer as well. This multi-tasking product has truly changed the game for me.  One of the things I love most about this face base is how well it absorbs into my skin. It instantly sinks in without leaving any greasy or sticky residue behind. My skin feels hydrated and smooth after application, making it the perfect canvas for makeup.  Speaking of makeup, the Bobbi Brown Face Base also doubles as a primer and boy does it do the job well. My foundation glides on effortlessly and lasts all day without any creasing or fading. It creates a flawless base for my makeup, allowing it to look airbrushed and flawless.  But the real standout feature of this product is the smell. It has a beautiful, refreshing scent that is not overwhelming or artificial. Applying it in the morning is like a mini aromatherapy session, giving me a burst of energy and starting my day off on a positive note.  I have also noticed that my skin looks brighter and more radiant since I started using the Bobbi Brown Face Base. Its formula is enriched with vitamins and antioxidants that help nourish and protect my skin. And as someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate that it is free from parabens and sulfates.  In conclusion, the Bobbi Brown Face Base has truly exceeded my expectations and I cannot imagine my skincare routine without it. It is a high-quality product that delivers on its promises and has become a must-have for me. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a moisturizer that also works as a primer. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_text: I am so glad I got to try the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base, and let me tell you…I love it! First of all, the SMELL! It smells like fresh lemons, but the sweet ones. reviews.review_text: Combining the effects of aging skin (37) and harsh winter weather, my skin has been losing its moisture. The key ingredient in it is shea butter, which makes it feel rich and creamy as you work it in. Although the primer is expensive, I only need a tiny amount to cover my entire face. Immediately after using it, my skin felt hydrated and smooth. After a week of using it regularly, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin and how my foundation looked. I even found myself using it without applying makeup and it made my skin feel hydrated, glowy, and soft. This primer has been a lifesaver for my aging skin and I will purchase it again and again!

The Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base is a makeup game-changer! This multivitamin-enriched moisturizing primer not only nourishes and plumps my skin but also creates the perfect canvas for foundation. The blend of Vitamin B, C, and E, along with Hyaluronic Acid and Shea Butter, provides essential nourishment and hydration. The real results speak for themselves – my makeup applies smoothly, looks flawless, and my skin feels nourished and healthy. A must-have for a radiant, well-prepped complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal-to-(very) dry skin. As someone who masks often, uses a retinoid, and experiences allergic rhinitis on a daily basis, I find that I am no stranger to flaky skin around my t-zone area (especially around my mouth), making it almost impossible for me to apply makeup due to it merely emphasizing the flaky dryness of my skin. Out of all the primers I've tried, this is the best primer at moisturizing and smoothing out the texture of my skin! (I still use a separate moisturizer underneath though.) It can sting to apply this if your skin is sensitized, so be warned, but no other primer has made my cheaper makeup look and apply so well. I feel that I don't need to use a whole lot of product to get the best result, so each jar lasts me awhile.  I recommend purchasing the trial size before committing to a full jar. My trial size has lasted me a good 2 yrs since I rarely wear makeup, but I find that when I don't use this primer, my makeup doesn't look nearly as good. Keep in mind that if your skin is peeling excessively (as in, the primer doesn't work as well at masking the flakes), consider first that you may be overexfoliating. Monitor your skincare, and this primer will treat you well.

But this actually makes a cushion that the foundation sort of floats on. Of course my wrinkles are still visible. But they aren’t worse. I just use foundation for dress up occasions. I have very little discoloration. When I got “my face on” for a recent family dinner my daughter said my makeup looked really good! I like that it is a multitasker too!

reviews.review_title: Funeral tears has nothing on this primer.

After 5-6hrs of crying off and on my make up didn't budge and remained flawless. I started out with the mini but am upgrading to the Jumbo. I am also getting the eye primer. I recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: A must have face base product
reviews.review_text: I’m very new to using primer. But OMG, after using this, there is just no going back. I used a couple more primer products from other brands but there’s none that does the job as fine as this one. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is so dry on accutane. Makeup doesn’t sit right and this is the only thing that saves me. Slather this on before my makeup and no crusties or dryness anymore. I’ve started using this at night too and my PIH also seems to be fading faster since I’ve started using it. You should probably consult your dermatologist if you wanna use this on accutane because of the actives in it but it’s been a non negotiable for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer! It makes my skin so soft and helps with dry patches that I usually get with make up. Will be buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t believe I actually found something that works. I have very oily skin. All over. All year round doesn’t matter. Tried all kinds of products and tricks but this actually works!! I read a lot of reviews that it helps with those that have dry skin but it’s been a game changer for me. I like a more natural look so I usually mix a foundation or glow product with my moisturizer. It keeps my make up looking great all day long. I even wore it overnight and noticed my blemishes were clearing up faster than usual. My ONLY complaint is the smell. It’s not bad, not great but it does have a very distinct smell - kind of lemony? Don’t quote me but the smell is definitely there, HOWEVER - it does go away so you aren’t smelling it all day long.

reviews.review_text: i'm a combo girlie but during the fall/winter, my skin gets SO DRY esp when the seasons are changing. this literally saves my makeup and makes literally the worst concealers work without creasing. i got my hands on the two 50 ml set during the sale (making two 50 ml containers only $76) and honestly, i would have still paid full price though the price is actually insane. would def rec for anyone that's struggling with concealers creasing/skin flaking in the colder months.

I also love its fragrance, it is not a fragrance free product. So if you don’t like fragranced product you may not enjoy using it. This is my go to go product when I am running short of time. Gifted by the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin feel so soft and smooth. It gives a slight blurring effect and smells incredible. It is pricey but a little bit goes a long way and it sits perfectly under makeup. While I wouldn’t say it gives drenching hydration it does make my skin less dry. I was gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A holy grail for a reason! This product smells great, is full of vitamins, and makes a wonderful primer for makeup! I have worn it in extremely humid climates, and my makeup somehow stays intact. I would repurchase this again! Complimentary from Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Bobbi Brown this product. First off the packaging is luxe. The product overall is this thicker cream that just glides on the skin. I am not a fan of the citrus scent because it does remind me of citronella candle, but if you can get past the scent the product is truly amazing. I have been using it everyday & my makeup wears really well over it. It truly hydrates my skin and the fact that it is a two-in-one product makes it my go-to for trips. A little goes a long way and it will last you a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift. I had been wanting to try this product out & was happy about it. I use it before I do my makeup & it definitely helps for a flawless look. You should get it. I think it’s worth it. Complimentary from Bobbi brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a good moisturizer to use before makeup! I love the smell, the consistency, the feeling of hydration and how the makeup adheres better to the skin after using it. Although it hydrates the skin well it doesn't get oily consistency, I highly recommend the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an OG product and it works so well. This smooths, primes, preps, and moisturizes your skin for suck a good base to layer your makeup on. My makeup doesn’t break up either, it just looks smooth. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just tried this moisturizer/primer and I absolutely LOVE it!! The texture is perfection. It goes on smooth and absorbs well and quickly. It left my skin feeling quenched and was a perfect base for makeup. - Gifted by Bobbi Brown -

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi brown I’m loving this as a primer and it really moisturizes my skin and gives me such a beautiful flawless look to apply my foundation over it. The texture is so luxurious and hydrating, a little bit goes a long way with this product.

reviews.review_title: A must in my make up routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard so many good things about this and I'm so happy I finally got to try this! It's a moisturizer and primer all in one which makes my make up routine so much simpler. You don't need a lot and a little goes a long way. There's  faint scent to it but goes away fast and the product absorbs quickly into the skin. I put on my foundation right after and there was no pilling or patchiness. Definitely worth it! I was gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite to prep, smooth and moisturize before putting on makeup! Not only does this provide the most lovely hydrating base but it also gives the perfect canvas to my foundation to stick to with no pilling or patchiness. I was gifted by Bobbi Brown and I can’t recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. I have dry skin and it soaks up this cream. It has a nice but not overpowering fragrance and feels like light whipped butter. When it goes on my face though, it is a nice, light, smooth moisturizer that has made my face feel so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer looks and feels like a high-end moisturizer. It is moisturizing and helped kept my foundation in place. I find that I only need a small amount of this, I used too much one time and it made my makeup look so unnatural, so a little goes a long way. Gifted by Bobby brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very smooth primer. My makeup applied very nicely and seemed to stay all day. Not scented & easy to apply. I also love the packaging. The little jar is very nice quality. Gifted by Bobbi brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It is the perfect makeup base. It is completely and totally for trying out. Your makeup will apply beautifully after using it. This product was gifted by Bobbi Brown. 100% recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown for consideration but all opinions are my own. The Vitamin Enriched Face Base is gorgeous - it's like the ultimate primer without being drying or silicone - ish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown. This moisturizer feels so rich and hydrating. I use it to prep my skin before makeup. This gives such a good finish to my skin after applying the foundation! Smells so good and skin looks plumped!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I especially love how versatile this product is. On days when I'm in a hurry or want a natural look, I can wear it alone as a lightweight moisturizer. And when I'm going for a full makeup look, it works as an excellent primer, helping my foundation adhere flawlessly and last throughout the day. It creates a smooth, even base that blurs imperfections and allows my makeup to blend effortlessly. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the way this looks and feels on my skin. I’ve always been curious about this product. It definitely lives up to the hype! I have dry/combo acne-prone, sensitive skin, and have not had any issues using this. However, it is heavily fragranced. I’m not sure if I’d repurchase for that reason. I’d recommend smelling this in store just to see if the fragrance bothers you or not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizes really well. I love that it uses vitamin E, it’s so good for my skin and helps give it a glow. Perfect for layering under makeup, gives a really nice base to help everything go on better. Great product to add to your daily skincare routine!  Gifted by Bobbi brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this cream to anyone seeking a luxurious and effective skincare experience but also a flawless makeup base! Whether you’re combatting signs of aging, seeking hydration, or simply looking to pamper yourself, this cream is a true gem that lives up to its promises. Your skin will thank you for it! I did receive this product complimentary from the brand for review purposes, but the opinions expressed in this review are solely my own and based on my personal experience with the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown in exchange for my honest review. I use moisturizer and primer under my makeup every day so I was excited to try this 2-in-1 product. I was pleasantly surprised! My makeup layers so well on top of it, so I will definitely continue use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 5 stars ⭐️ The Bobbi Brown Vitamin E Enriched Skin Base is a great option for those looking for a moisturizing primer! It’s very hydrating & plumping, serving as a nice base for glowy/natural makeup. Foundation lays nicely on top of the base with no pilling, splotches, dry patches, etc. Although I usually prefer my makeup/skincare fragrance-free, this skin base has a pleasant & refreshing scent to it (I think it has notes of grapefruit and Germanium if I remember correctly). Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base was gifted to me by  Bobbi Brown. One of my friends always repurchases this product and I am glad to have it. It is a great moisturizer that is very hydrating and not oily. It is also a great primer. I don't care the scent, but like to use it in AM with light makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by BobbiBrown. This face base was so popular back in the day and I'm glad I got to try it out. I love it so much for my dry skin. All my foundations and base products apply great on top. Since it is hotter now, I just use this face base as my moisturizer and primer instead of going in with another moisturizer underneath. This has a lovely citrus scent too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I have been loving this product so much it layers so well under my makeup and is super long lasting. The moisture lasts really long and so does my makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown. It has a very silky smooth feel to it. A little bit how’s a long way. My face does feel more hydrated and my skin looks more firm after I apply it. My skin is moist without feeling greasy or shiny. My makeup goes on much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Bobbi Brown the Enriched Face Base, and has been a game changer in my makeup routine! A little goes a long way making this product super moisturizing and a great base for makeup! My skin feels super hydrated after application, and leaves a nice dewy look. Definitely give this a try if your looking to step up your face base!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this was honestly one of the best primers I’ve tried! Very underrated. Made my make up look so GOOD. I have dry skin and this did not dry me out at all either. Will definitely be repurchasing and recommend trying. This was complimentary from Bobbi brown but this is my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The vitamin enriched face base is my new holy grail! I received this product gifted by bobbi brown and so far the results are incredible. I love how it's both a primer and a moisturizer at the same time. It works great and feels great too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the consistency on this product it almost feels like it’s going to be dense but it layers so nicely! It has a slight lemony scent but it’s not offputting at all and it dries to a perfectly tacky consistency. Its so nice for putting makeup on top, products layer really nicely and it doesn’t seem to emphasize any texture on my face. You can definitely tell this is a high-end product it’s seems like it would be perfect for a makeup artist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time customer - I have combination skin and I've heard great things about the Bobbi Brown brand.  I've been looking for a new primer and I am not disappointed! My skin feels and looks hydrated and helps smooth out any lines (gifted by bobbibrown)

reviews.review_title: Recommend for dry skin, not oily skin types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown. The product is very creamy and does not leave a white cast once applied. It has a small citrus smell, and feels light on the skin. Unfortunately I probably would not wear if you have oily skin, I would probably only use as part of skincare routine. If you have dry skin I would recommend as it is very hydrating and gives a dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream is my new favorite face cream! It’s super light but I feel very moisturized after. I like how it doesn’t clog my pores and I can’t feel it on my skin. This was gifted to me by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown gifted me their Face Base in exchange for an honest review. The cream is a nice mix of nourishing without being heavy. I have combination skin and have been using it both for night- and daytime. The cream creates a perfect base for make up application and sinks in quickly.  One thing to note: if you are sensitive to scents, be aware that it does have a citrus scent. I personally enjoy it but know that some people prefer their creams unscented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years on end. Everytime I use it under makeup I always get compliments about how amazing my skin looks! Definitely pricey but totally worth the splurge! Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_title: Instantly part of my makeup routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a must have for makeup! This makes such a difference to use as a base before applying makeup! My foundation looks so much better with this, and it feels amazing on the skin! I am in love with this! Gifted by bobbibrown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this face base to anyone who is looking for a lightweight, hydrating, and protective moisturizer and primer. It is a great option for people with dry, dehydrated, or mature skin. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is so worth the hype! I love this! This product is so moisturizing. I love the smell too. And the jar is big! Would recommend this product! It’s goes great under makeup and does not make it move around! Wear alone or under makeup. Gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Vitamin Enriched Face Base Primer Moisturizer was complimentary from Bobbi Brown. This product creates a perfect base for my makeup application. I love how this product has multiple uses. It is both a primer and moisturizer. This gives me great options for my skin. I can use this product for skincare and makeup. When using this product as a primer, I find this to be helpful for prepping my skin. As for moisturizer, I love this product! It is lightweight, creamy, hydrating, and plumps the skin. I also love the smell! It smells so fresh! This product exceeded my expectations!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So happy to have tried this 2 in 1 product. I love the smell - it’s citrusy but clean. A little goes a long way and the silkiness of the moisturizer makes it’s feel like luxury. It’s the perfect base before applying makeup!! Gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Bobbi Brown and overall, I think it’s great! The texture & smell of the product are both great and the formula is very hydrating! It went on smooth and made a great base for my makeup. I really like how smooth my foundation applied compared to normal. I would definitely recommend this product and would repurchase myself!!🤍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I usually don't purchase or use face primers but have been pleasantly surprised. It moisturizes my skin and then my makeup applies flawlessly over it.
